scripts.message: You have 60 minutes for lunch, so don't waste your time!
Since you don’t have much time, you’re thinking about whether you should lock your computer or not. People at the office are like family – what can go wrong?
Leaving the office, the manager asks you to fetch paper waste. It should be shredded.

answers.text: Get paper waste and shred it (10 min)

scripts.message: At lunch, you need to go online. You can connect to café Wi-Fi networks. But there are two of them – one has a password, the other does not. And the password is yet to be found out. Why do we need to go through the trouble when there is one with public access?
During lunch, your colleague asks you whether you’ve cleared the bill of some company. Why not discuss corporate finances in a crowded café?

answers.text: Leave it and mind your own business

scripts.message: On your way back, at the checkpoint, you noticed a stylish black flash drive with your company logo on it. Apparently, one of your colleagues lost it. Will you check what’s on it?

answers.text: Pick up the flash drive and check it on you computer
Hand the flash drive over to the system administrator
